attributes.action: Draw a realistic salary and start acting in the interests of the masses (as elected)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government continue to be a self promoting organisation,none of these people will ever have to take a real job but will live a life of oppulence for the rest of their lifes. This country is on its knees and the people are over burdened in every aspect of life. The PM and his government should draw a salary representative of the masses(£25k)reflecting that they are leading a broken country and they yshould act to improve life for the masses, as they improve the countrys standing so there salary should rise to reflect that of society. They cannot govern whilst they are treated like royalty.
